content: {"name": "Western Wake Crisis Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Must live in Apex, New Hill, Fuquay-Varina, Holly Springs, Willow Springs or Friendship OR be a member (active or retired) of the US military.\nIf you are a member (active or retired) of the US military, please bring your military ID.\n\tPlease call 919-362-0657 to make an appointment for in-person pantry shopping or curbside grocery pick up", "email": "", "url": "https://wwcm.org/our-services/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1600 Olive Chapel Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Chapel Ridge", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27502", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.7383003, "longitude": -78.8900547}, "phones": [{"number": "(919) 362-0657", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
